mcq.statement: As per the Case of Miss Asma Jillani vs Government of Pakistan (PLD 1972 S.C 139), filed against the detention of Malik Ghulam Jillani which was dismissed by the Lahore High Court, one of the questions before the Supreme Court was whether the doctrine enunciated in the case of _____ was correct.

options.b: Maulvi Tamiz-ud-Din Khan vs Governor General of Pakistan (PLD 1955 F.C 240)
options.c: Muhammad Nawaz Sharif vs President of Pakistan (PLD 1993 SC 473)
